267std::string to_string(DeckLink::PixelFormat value) {
268 switch(value) {
269 case DeckLink::PixelFormat::Unknown:
270 return "Unknown";
271 case DeckLink::PixelFormat::YUV_8Bit:
272 return "YUV_8Bit";
273 case DeckLink::PixelFormat::YUV_10Bit:
274 return "YUV_10Bit";
275 case DeckLink::PixelFormat::ARGB_8Bit:
276 return "ARGB_8Bit";
277 case DeckLink::PixelFormat::BGRA_8Bit:
278 return "BGRA_8Bit";
279 case DeckLink::PixelFormat::RGB_10Bit:
280 return "RGB_10Bit";
281 case DeckLink::PixelFormat::RGB_12Bit:
282 return "RGB_12Bit";
283 case DeckLink::PixelFormat::RGBLE_12Bit:
284 return "RGBLE_12Bit";
285 case DeckLink::PixelFormat::RGBXLE_10Bit:
286 return "RGBXLE_10Bit";
287 case DeckLink::PixelFormat::RGBX_10Bit:
288 return "RGBX_10Bit";
289 case DeckLink::PixelFormat::H265:
290 return "H265";
291 case DeckLink::PixelFormat::DNxHR:
292 return "DNxHR";
293
294 default: return "Unknown Value";
295 }

306 PixelFormat to_PixelFormat(const std::string & value) {
307 if (value == "Unknown")
308 return PixelFormat::Unknown;

310 return PixelFormat::YUV_8Bit;
311 else if (value == "YUV_10Bit")
312 return PixelFormat::YUV_10Bit;

316 return PixelFormat::BGRA_8Bit;
317 else if (value == "RGB_10Bit")
318 return PixelFormat::RGB_10Bit;
319 else if (value == "RGB_12Bit")
320 return PixelFormat::RGB_12Bit;
321 else if (value == "RGBLE_12Bit")
322 return PixelFormat::RGBLE_12Bit;
323 else if (value == "RGBXLE_10Bit")
324 return PixelFormat::RGBXLE_10Bit;
325 else if (value == "RGBX_10Bit")
326 return PixelFormat::RGBX_10Bit;

337 std::string pretty_print(PixelFormat value) {
338 if (value == PixelFormat::Unknown)
339 return "Unknown";
340 else if (value == PixelFormat::YUV_8Bit)
341 return "8-bit YUV";
342 else if (value == PixelFormat::YUV_10Bit)
343 return "10-bit YUV";
344 else if (value == PixelFormat::ARGB_8Bit)
345 return "8-bit ARGB";
346 else if (value == PixelFormat::BGRA_8Bit)
347 return "8-bit BGRA";
348 else if (value == PixelFormat::RGB_10Bit)
349 return "10-bit RGB";
350 else if (value == PixelFormat::RGB_12Bit)
351 return "12-bit RGB";
352 else if (value == PixelFormat::RGBLE_12Bit)
353 return "12-bit RGBLE";
354 else if (value == PixelFormat::RGBXLE_10Bit)
355 return "10-bit RGBXLE";
356 else if (value == PixelFormat::RGBX_10Bit)
357 return "10-bit RGBX";
358 else if (value == PixelFormat::H265)
359 return "H.265";
360 else if (value == PixelFormat::DNxHR)
361 return "DNxHR";
362
363 throw std::out_of_range(
364 std::to_string(
365 static_cast<std::underlying_type<PixelFormat>::type>(value)
366 )
367 );

369
370 int get_depth(PixelFormat value) {
371 if (value == PixelFormat::Unknown)
372 return -1;
373 else if (value == PixelFormat::YUV_8Bit)
374 return -1;
375 else if (value == PixelFormat::YUV_10Bit)
376 return -1;
377 else if (value == PixelFormat::ARGB_8Bit)
378 return -1;
379 else if (value == PixelFormat::BGRA_8Bit)
380 return 4;
381 else if (value == PixelFormat::RGB_10Bit)
382 return -1;
383 else if (value == PixelFormat::RGB_12Bit)
384 return -1;
385 else if (value == PixelFormat::RGBLE_12Bit)
386 return -1;
387 else if (value == PixelFormat::RGBXLE_10Bit)
388 return -1;
389 else if (value == PixelFormat::RGBX_10Bit)
390 return -1;
391 else if (value == PixelFormat::H265)
392 return -1;
393 else if (value == PixelFormat::DNxHR)
394 return -1;
395
396 throw std::out_of_range(
397 std::to_string(
398 static_cast<std::underlying_type<PixelFormat>::type>(value)
399 )
400 );
401 }
402
403
404 }

408std::string to_string(DeckLink::FieldDominance value) {
409 switch(value) {
410 case DeckLink::FieldDominance::Unknown:
411 return "Unknown";
412 case DeckLink::FieldDominance::LowerFieldFirst:
413 return "LowerFieldFirst";
414 case DeckLink::FieldDominance::UpperFieldFirst:
415 return "UpperFieldFirst";
416 case DeckLink::FieldDominance::Progressive:
417 return "Progressive";
418 case DeckLink::FieldDominance::ProgressiveSegmented:
419 return "ProgressiveSegmented";
420
421 default: return "Unknown Value";
422 }

433 FieldDominance to_FieldDominance(const std::string & value) {
434 if (value == "Unknown")
435 return FieldDominance::Unknown;
436 else if (value == "LowerFieldFirst")
437 return FieldDominance::LowerFieldFirst;
438 else if (value == "UpperFieldFirst")
439 return FieldDominance::UpperFieldFirst;
440 else if (value == "Progressive")
441 return FieldDominance::Progressive;
442 else if (value == "ProgressiveSegmented")
443 return FieldDominance::ProgressiveSegmented;
444
445 throw std::out_of_range(value);
446 }

448 namespace FieldDominance_ {
449
450 std::string get_description(FieldDominance value) {
451 if (value == FieldDominance::Unknown)
452 return "Indeterminate field dominance.";
453 else if (value == FieldDominance::LowerFieldFirst)
454 return "Indeterminate field dominance.";
455 else if (value == FieldDominance::UpperFieldFirst)
456 return "The first frame starts with the upper field (the top scan line).";
457 else if (value == FieldDominance::Progressive)
458 return "A complete frame containing all scan lines.";
459 else if (value == FieldDominance::ProgressiveSegmented)
460 return "A progressive frame encoded as a PsF";
461
462 throw std::out_of_range(
463 std::to_string(
464 static_cast<std::underlying_type<FieldDominance>::type>(value)
465 )
466 );
467 }
468
469
470 }

560std::string to_string(DeckLink::AttributeType value) {

685 case DeckLink::AttributeID::MicrophoneInputGainMaximum:
686 return "MicrophoneInputGainMaximum";
687 case DeckLink::AttributeID::SerialPortDeviceName:
688 return "SerialPortDeviceName";
689 case DeckLink::AttributeID::VendorName:
690 return "VendorName";
691 case DeckLink::AttributeID::DisplayName:
692 return "DisplayName";
693 case DeckLink::AttributeID::ModelName:
694 return "ModelName";
695
696 default: return "Unknown Value";
697 }
698}
699
700
701std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const DeckLink::AttributeID value) {
702 os << to_string(value);
703 return os;
704}

803 namespace AttributeID_ {
804
805 AttributeType get_value_type(AttributeID value) {
806 if (value == AttributeID::SupportsInternalKeying)
807 return AttributeType::Flag;
808 else if (value == AttributeID::SupportsExternalKeying)
809 return AttributeType::Flag;
810 else if (value == AttributeID::SupportsHDKeying)
811 return AttributeType::Flag;
812 else if (value == AttributeID::SupportsInputFormatDetection)
813 return AttributeType::Flag;
814 else if (value == AttributeID::SupportsClockTimingAdjustment)
815 return AttributeType::Flag;
816 else if (value == AttributeID::SupportsFulDuplex)
817 return AttributeType::Flag;
818 else if (value == AttributeID::SupportsFullFrameReferenceTimingOffset)
819 return AttributeType::Flag;
820 else if (value == AttributeID::SupportsSMPTELevelOutput)
821 return AttributeType::Flag;
822 else if (value == AttributeID::SupportsDualLinkSDI)
823 return AttributeType::Flag;
824 else if (value == AttributeID::SupportsQuadLinkSDI)
825 return AttributeType::Flag;
826 else if (value == AttributeID::SupportsIdleOutput)
827 return AttributeType::Flag;
828 else if (value == AttributeID::SupportsDuplexModeConfiguration)
829 return AttributeType::Flag;
830 else if (value == AttributeID::SupportsHDRMetaData)
831 return AttributeType::Flag;
832 else if (value == AttributeID::HasReferenceInput)
833 return AttributeType::Flag;
834 else if (value == AttributeID::HasSerialPort)
835 return AttributeType::Flag;
836 else if (value == AttributeID::HasAnalogVideoOutputGain)
837 return AttributeType::Flag;
838 else if (value == AttributeID::CanOnlyAdjustOverallVideoOutputGain)
839 return AttributeType::Flag;
840 else if (value == AttributeID::HasVideoInputAntiAliasingFilter)
841 return AttributeType::Flag;
842 else if (value == AttributeID::HasBypass)
843 return AttributeType::Flag;
844 else if (value == AttributeID::HasLTCTimecodeOutput)
845 return AttributeType::Flag;
846 else if (value == AttributeID::MaximumAudioChannels)
847 return AttributeType::Int;
848 else if (value == AttributeID::MaximumAnalogAudioChannels)
849 return AttributeType::Int;
850 else if (value == AttributeID::NumberOfSubDevices)
851 return AttributeType::Int;
852 else if (value == AttributeID::SubDeviceIndex)
853 return AttributeType::Int;
854 else if (value == AttributeID::PersistentID)
855 return AttributeType::Int;
856 else if (value == AttributeID::PairedDevicePersistentID)
857 return AttributeType::Int;
858 else if (value == AttributeID::DeviceGroupID)
859 return AttributeType::Int;
860 else if (value == AttributeID::TopologicalID)
861 return AttributeType::Int;
862 else if (value == AttributeID::VideoOutputConnections)
863 return AttributeType::Int;
864 else if (value == AttributeID::VideoInputConnections)
865 return AttributeType::Int;
866 else if (value == AttributeID::AudioOutputConnections)
867 return AttributeType::Int;
868 else if (value == AttributeID::AudioInputConnections)
869 return AttributeType::Int;
870 else if (value == AttributeID::VideoIOSupport)
871 return AttributeType::Int;
872 else if (value == AttributeID::ControlConnections)
873 return AttributeType::Int;
874 else if (value == AttributeID::DeviceInterface)
875 return AttributeType::Int;
876 else if (value == AttributeID::VideoInputGainMinimum)
877 return AttributeType::Float;
878 else if (value == AttributeID::VideoInputGainMaximum)
879 return AttributeType::Float;
880 else if (value == AttributeID::VideoOutputGainMinimum)
881 return AttributeType::Float;
882 else if (value == AttributeID::VideoOutputGainMaximum)
883 return AttributeType::Float;
884 else if (value == AttributeID::MicrophoneInputGainMinimum)
885 return AttributeType::Float;
886 else if (value == AttributeID::MicrophoneInputGainMaximum)
887 return AttributeType::Float;
888 else if (value == AttributeID::SerialPortDeviceName)
889 return AttributeType::String;
890 else if (value == AttributeID::VendorName)
891 return AttributeType::String;
892 else if (value == AttributeID::DisplayName)
893 return AttributeType::String;
894 else if (value == AttributeID::ModelName)
895 return AttributeType::String;
896
897 throw std::out_of_range(
898 std::to_string(
899 static_cast<std::underlying_type<AttributeID>::type>(value)
900 )
901 );
902 }
903
904 std::string get_explanation(AttributeID value) {
905 if (value == AttributeID::SupportsInternalKeying)
906 return "True if internal keying is supported on this device.";
907 else if (value == AttributeID::SupportsExternalKeying)
908 return "True if external keying is supported on this device.";
909 else if (value == AttributeID::SupportsHDKeying)
910 return "";
911 else if (value == AttributeID::SupportsInputFormatDetection)
912 return "True if input format detection is supported on this device.";
913 else if (value == AttributeID::SupportsClockTimingAdjustment)
914 return "True if this device supports clock timing adjustment";
915 else if (value == AttributeID::SupportsFulDuplex)
916 return "True if the DeckLink device supports capture and playback simultaneously.";
917 else if (value == AttributeID::SupportsFullFrameReferenceTimingOffset)
918 return "True if the DeckLink device supports genlock offset adjustment wider than +/- 511 pixels.";
919 else if (value == AttributeID::SupportsSMPTELevelOutput)
920 return "True if SMPTE Level A output is supported on this device.";
921 else if (value == AttributeID::SupportsDualLinkSDI)
922 return "True if SDI dual-link is supported on this device.";
923 else if (value == AttributeID::SupportsQuadLinkSDI)
924 return "True if SDI quad-link is supported on this device.";
925 else if (value == AttributeID::SupportsIdleOutput)
926 return "True if this device supports idle output.";
927 else if (value == AttributeID::SupportsDuplexModeConfiguration)
928 return "True if the DeckLink device supports duplex mode configuration.";
929 else if (value == AttributeID::SupportsHDRMetaData)
930 return "True if the device supports transport of HDR metadata.";
931 else if (value == AttributeID::HasReferenceInput)
932 return "True if the DeckLink device has a genlock reference source input connector.";
933 else if (value == AttributeID::HasSerialPort)
934 return "True if device has a serial port.";
935 else if (value == AttributeID::HasAnalogVideoOutputGain)
936 return "True if analog video output gain adjustment is supported on this device.";
937 else if (value == AttributeID::CanOnlyAdjustOverallVideoOutputGain)
938 return "True if only the overall video output gain can be adjusted. In this case, only the luma gain can be accessed with the IDeckLinkConfiguration interface, and it controls all three gains (luma, chroma blue and chroma red).";
939 else if (value == AttributeID::HasVideoInputAntiAliasingFilter)
940 return "True if there is an antialising filter on the analog video input of this device.";
941 else if (value == AttributeID::HasBypass)
942 return "True if this device has loop-through bypass function.";
943 else if (value == AttributeID::HasLTCTimecodeOutput)
944 return "True if this device has a dedicated LTC input";
945 else if (value == AttributeID::MaximumAudioChannels)
946 return "The maximum number of embedded audio channels on digital connections supported by this device";
947 else if (value == AttributeID::MaximumAnalogAudioChannels)
948 return "The maximum number of analog audio channels supported by this device.";
949 else if (value == AttributeID::NumberOfSubDevices)
950 return "Some DeckLink hardware devices contain multiple independent sub-devices. This attribute will be equal to one for most devices, or two or more on a card with multiple sub-devices.";
951 else if (value == AttributeID::SubDeviceIndex)
952 return "Some DeckLink hardware devices contain multiple independent sub-devices. This attribute indicates the index of the sub-device, starting from zero.";
953 else if (value == AttributeID::PersistentID)
954 return "A device specific 32 bit unique identifier.";
955 else if (value == AttributeID::PairedDevicePersistentID)
956 return "The device specific 32 bit unique identifier of the paired sub-device (If the DeckLink device has paired sub-devices - e.g. the DeckLink Quad 2).";
957 else if (value == AttributeID::DeviceGroupID)
958 return "A 32 bit identifier used to group sub-devices belonging to the same DeckLink hardware device. Supported if the sub-device supports BMDDeckLinkPersistentID";
959 else if (value == AttributeID::TopologicalID)
960 return "An identifier for DeckLink devices. This feature is supported on a given device if S_OK is returned. The ID will persist across reboots assuming that devices are not disconnected or moved to a different slot.";
961 else if (value == AttributeID::VideoOutputConnections)
962 return "The video output connections supported by the hardware. Multiple video output connections can be active simultaneously.";
963 else if (value == AttributeID::VideoInputConnections)
964 return "The video input connections supported by the hardware";
965 else if (value == AttributeID::AudioOutputConnections)
966 return "The audio output connections supported by the hardware. Multiple audio output connections can be active simultaneously.";
967 else if (value == AttributeID::AudioInputConnections)
968 return "The audio input connections supported by the hardware";
969 else if (value == AttributeID::VideoIOSupport)
970 return "The capture and/or playback capability of the device.";
971 else if (value == AttributeID::ControlConnections)
972 return "The deck control connections supported by the hardware.";
973 else if (value == AttributeID::DeviceInterface)
974 return "The active device interface (see BMDDeviceInterface for more information)";
975 else if (value == AttributeID::VideoInputGainMinimum)
976 return "The minimum video input gain in dB for this device.";
977 else if (value == AttributeID::VideoInputGainMaximum)
978 return "The maximum video input gain in dB for this device.";
979 else if (value == AttributeID::VideoOutputGainMinimum)
980 return "The minimum video output gain in dB for this device.";
981 else if (value == AttributeID::VideoOutputGainMaximum)
982 return "The maximum video output gain in dB for this device.";
983 else if (value == AttributeID::MicrophoneInputGainMinimum)
984 return "The minimum microphone input gain in dB for this device.";
985 else if (value == AttributeID::MicrophoneInputGainMaximum)
986 return "The maximum microphone input gain in dB for this device.";
987 else if (value == AttributeID::SerialPortDeviceName)
988 return "The operating system name of the RS422 serial port on this device.";
989 else if (value == AttributeID::VendorName)
990 return "Hardware vendor name. Returned as a static string which must not be freed by the caller.";
991 else if (value == AttributeID::DisplayName)
992 return "The device’s display name. See IDeckLink::GetDisplayName.";
993 else if (value == AttributeID::ModelName)
994 return "Hardware Model Name. See IDeckLink::GetModelName.";
995
996 throw std::out_of_range(
997 std::to_string(
998 static_cast<std::underlying_type<AttributeID>::type>(value)
999 )
1000 );
1001 }
1002
1003
1004 }

1008std::string to_string(DeckLink::ConfigurationID value) {
1009 switch(value) {
1010 case DeckLink::ConfigurationID::Use1080pNotPsF:
1011 return "Use1080pNotPsF";
1012 case DeckLink::ConfigurationID::HDMI3DPackingFormat:

1020 case DeckLink::ConfigurationID::SDIVideoOutput444:
1021 return "SDIVideoOutput444";

1151
1152std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const DeckLink::ConfigurationID value) {
1153 os << to_string(value);
1154 return os;
1155}

1158
1159 ConfigurationID to_ConfigurationID(const std::string & value) {
1160 if (value == "Use1080pNotPsF")
1161 return ConfigurationID::Use1080pNotPsF;
1162 else if (value == "HDMI3DPackingFormat")
1163 return ConfigurationID::HDMI3DPackingFormat;
1164 else if (value == "AnalogAudioConsumerLevels")
1165 return ConfigurationID::AnalogAudioConsumerLevels;
1166 else if (value == "FieldFlickerRemoval")
1167 return ConfigurationID::FieldFlickerRemoval;
1168 else if (value == "HD1080p24ToHD1080i5994Conversion")
1169 return ConfigurationID::HD1080p24ToHD1080i5994Conversion;
1170 else if (value == "SDIVideoOutput444")
1171 return ConfigurationID::SDIVideoOutput444;
1172 else if (value == "BlackVideoOutputDuringCapture")
1173 return ConfigurationID::BlackVideoOutputDuringCapture;
1174 else if (value == "ReferenceInputTimingOffset")
1175 return ConfigurationID::ReferenceInputTimingOffset;
1176 else if (value == "CapturePassThroughMode")
1177 return ConfigurationID::CapturePassThroughMode;
1178 else if (value == "VideoOutputConnection")
1179 return ConfigurationID::VideoOutputConnection;
1180 else if (value == "VideoOutputConversionMode")
1181 return ConfigurationID::VideoOutputConversionMode;
1182 else if (value == "AnalogVideoOutputFlags")
1183 return ConfigurationID::AnalogVideoOutputFlags;
1184 else if (value == "VideoInputConnection")
1185 return ConfigurationID::VideoInputConnection;
1186 else if (value == "AnalogVideoInputFlags")
1187 return ConfigurationID::AnalogVideoInputFlags;
1188 else if (value == "VideoInputConversionMode")
1189 return ConfigurationID::VideoInputConversionMode;
1190 else if (value == "PulldownSequenceInitialTimecodeFrame")
1191 return ConfigurationID::PulldownSequenceInitialTimecodeFrame;
1192 else if (value == "VANCSourceLine1Mapping")
1193 return ConfigurationID::VANCSourceLine1Mapping;
1194 else if (value == "VANCSourceLine2Mapping")
1195 return ConfigurationID::VANCSourceLine2Mapping;
1196 else if (value == "VANCSourceLine3Mapping")
1197 return ConfigurationID::VANCSourceLine3Mapping;
1198 else if (value == "AudioInputConnection")
1199 return ConfigurationID::AudioInputConnection;
1200 else if (value == "AnalogAudioInputScaleChannel1")
1201 return ConfigurationID::AnalogAudioInputScaleChannel1;
1202 else if (value == "AnalogAudioInputScaleChannel2")
1203 return ConfigurationID::AnalogAudioInputScaleChannel2;
1204 else if (value == "AnalogAudioInputScaleChannel3")
1205 return ConfigurationID::AnalogAudioInputScaleChannel3;
1206 else if (value == "AnalogAudioInputScaleChannel4")
1207 return ConfigurationID::AnalogAudioInputScaleChannel4;
1208 else if (value == "DigitalAudioInputScale")
1209 return ConfigurationID::DigitalAudioInputScale;
1210 else if (value == "AudioOutputAESAnalogSwitch")
1211 return ConfigurationID::AudioOutputAESAnalogSwitch;
1212 else if (value == "AnalogAudioOutputScaleChannel1")
1213 return ConfigurationID::AnalogAudioOutputScaleChannel1;
1214 else if (value == "AnalogAudioOutputScaleChannel2")
1215 return ConfigurationID::AnalogAudioOutputScaleChannel2;
1216 else if (value == "AnalogAudioOutputScaleChannel3")
1217 return ConfigurationID::AnalogAudioOutputScaleChannel3;
1218 else if (value == "AnalogAudioOutputScaleChannel4")
1219 return ConfigurationID::AnalogAudioOutputScaleChannel4;
1220 else if (value == "DigitalAudioOutputScale")
1221 return ConfigurationID::DigitalAudioOutputScale;
1222 else if (value == "DownConversionOnAllAnalogOutput")
1223 return ConfigurationID::DownConversionOnAllAnalogOutput;
1224 else if (value == "SMPTELevelAOutput")
1225 return ConfigurationID::SMPTELevelAOutput;
1226 else if (value == "DeviceInformationLabel")
1227 return ConfigurationID::DeviceInformationLabel;
1228 else if (value == "DeviceInformationSerialNumber")
1229 return ConfigurationID::DeviceInformationSerialNumber;
1230 else if (value == "DeviceInformationCompany")
1231 return ConfigurationID::DeviceInformationCompany;
1232 else if (value == "DeviceInformationPhone")
1233 return ConfigurationID::DeviceInformationPhone;
1234 else if (value == "DeviceInformationEmail")
1235 return ConfigurationID::DeviceInformationEmail;

1452std::string to_string(DeckLink::StatusID value) {
1453 switch(value) {
1454 case DeckLink::StatusID::DetectedVideoInputMode:
1455 return "DetectedVideoInputMode";
1456 case DeckLink::StatusID::DetectedVideoInputFlags:
1457 return "DetectedVideoInputFlags";
1458 case DeckLink::StatusID::CurrentVideoInputMode:
1459 return "CurrentVideoInputMode";
1460 case DeckLink::StatusID::CurrentVideoInputPixelFormat:
1461 return "CurrentVideoInputPixelFormat";
1462 case DeckLink::StatusID::CurrentVideoInputFlags:
1463 return "CurrentVideoInputFlags";
1464 case DeckLink::StatusID::CurrentVideoOutputMode:
1465 return "CurrentVideoOutputMode";
1466 case DeckLink::StatusID::CurrentVideoOutputFlags:
1467 return "CurrentVideoOutputFlags";
1468 case DeckLink::StatusID::PCIExpressLinkWidth:
1469 return "PCIExpressLinkWidth";
1470 case DeckLink::StatusID::PCIExpressLinkSpeed:
1471 return "PCIExpressLinkSpeed";
1472 case DeckLink::StatusID::LastVideoOutputPixelFormat:
1473 return "LastVideoOutputPixelFormat";
1474 case DeckLink::StatusID::ReferenceSignalMode:
1475 return "ReferenceSignalMode";
1476 case DeckLink::StatusID::DuplexMode:
1477 return "DuplexMode";
1478 case DeckLink::StatusID::BusyState:
1479 return "BusyState";
1480 case DeckLink::StatusID::VideoInputSignalLocked:
1481 return "VideoInputSignalLocked";
1482 case DeckLink::StatusID::ReferenceSignalLocked:
1483 return "ReferenceSignalLocked";
1484 case DeckLink::StatusID::ReferenceSignalFlags:
1485 return "ReferenceSignalFlags";
1486
1487 default: return "Unknown Value";
1488 }
1489}

1499 StatusID to_StatusID(const std::string & value) {
1500 if (value == "DetectedVideoInputMode")
1501 return StatusID::DetectedVideoInputMode;
1502 else if (value == "DetectedVideoInputFlags")
1503 return StatusID::DetectedVideoInputFlags;
1504 else if (value == "CurrentVideoInputMode")
1505 return StatusID::CurrentVideoInputMode;
1506 else if (value == "CurrentVideoInputPixelFormat")
1507 return StatusID::CurrentVideoInputPixelFormat;
1508 else if (value == "CurrentVideoInputFlags")
1509 return StatusID::CurrentVideoInputFlags;
1510 else if (value == "CurrentVideoOutputMode")
1511 return StatusID::CurrentVideoOutputMode;
1512 else if (value == "CurrentVideoOutputFlags")
1513 return StatusID::CurrentVideoOutputFlags;
1514 else if (value == "PCIExpressLinkWidth")
1515 return StatusID::PCIExpressLinkWidth;
1516 else if (value == "PCIExpressLinkSpeed")
1517 return StatusID::PCIExpressLinkSpeed;
1518 else if (value == "LastVideoOutputPixelFormat")
1519 return StatusID::LastVideoOutputPixelFormat;
1520 else if (value == "ReferenceSignalMode")
1521 return StatusID::ReferenceSignalMode;
1522 else if (value == "DuplexMode")
1523 return StatusID::DuplexMode;
1524 else if (value == "BusyState")
1525 return StatusID::BusyState;
1526 else if (value == "VideoInputSignalLocked")
1527 return StatusID::VideoInputSignalLocked;
1528 else if (value == "ReferenceSignalLocked")
1529 return StatusID::ReferenceSignalLocked;
1530 else if (value == "ReferenceSignalFlags")
1531 return StatusID::ReferenceSignalFlags;
1532
1533 throw std::out_of_range(value);
1534 }

1701std::string to_string(DeckLink::TimecodeFormat value) {
1702 switch(value) {
1703 case DeckLink::TimecodeFormat::RP188VITC1:
1704 return "RP188VITC1";
1705 case DeckLink::TimecodeFormat::RP188VITC2:
1706 return "RP188VITC2";
1707 case DeckLink::TimecodeFormat::RP188LTC:
1708 return "RP188LTC";

1711 case DeckLink::TimecodeFormat::VITC:
1712 return "VITC";
1713 case DeckLink::TimecodeFormat::VITCField2:
1714 return "VITCField2";
1715 case DeckLink::TimecodeFormat::Serial:
1716 return "Serial";
1717
1718 default: return "Unknown Value";
1719 }
